items.sentence: I\'m the one that convinced Tom to try to do that.
I can\'t tell you how good it is to see you again.
No matter how fast you run, you won\'t be in time.
Tom has already been asked not to do that anymore.
I\'ve never seen Tom do anything like that before.
Mary was the most beautiful woman at Tom\'s party.
Tom reached for one of the books on the top shelf.
Tom realized that Mary might not like him so much.
Do you have anyone on your staff who knows French?
Do you have enough people here to play volleyball?
